headline: GDX: Sell The Gold Miners
summary: GDX rallied with inflation trades, but overvaluation and gold risks make TIPS more appealing. Find out why GDX ETF is a strong sell.

headline: Newmont Announces a Decrease in its Holdings of Discovery Silver Corp.
summary: Newmont Corporation (NYSE: NEM) (TSX: NGT) (ASX: NEM) (PNGX: NEM) ("Newmont" or the "Company") announced today a decrease in its holdings of common shares ("Common Shares") in the capital of Discovery Silver Corp. ("Discovery").
